description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5l46o","text":"Ancient DNA protocols from sampling to library preparation for shotgun Illumina sequencing - aDNA lab UTIG. All protocols except the indexing PCR and purification need to be performed in a dedicated ancient DNA laboratory (see guidelines).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3s3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enrq7","text":"The individual steps are respective protocols are:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ame1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqlme","text":"1. Sampling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2hhl","text":"1.a tooth roots","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95aoe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97h22","text":"2. Decontamination of samples (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6q8a5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qr3b","text":"3. Ancient DNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co5b1","text":"3.a high volume (chunk samples)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaisd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3iqeg","text":"4. Purification of DNA extracts","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99ric","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"deai3","text":"6. Library preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tl78","text":"6.a dsDNA, double indexing, non-UDG, 2x split","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4heou","text":"6.b dsDNA, single indexing, non-UDG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qp9q","text":"6.c dsDNA, double indexing, full-UDG, 2x split","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnvmc","text":"6.d dsDNA, single indexing, full-UDG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"259cm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v7db","text":"7. Indexing PCR and purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"523kr","text":"Ancient DNA facility (\"aDNA lab\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82art","text":"All steps from sampling to library preparation need to be performed in a dedicated ancient DNA facility. The ancient DNA facility, accessible only to instructed personnel, consists of a cascade of rooms with HEPA-filtrated air and positive air pressure from the laboratories towards the entry rooms to avoid the introduction of modern DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"corra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11do0","text":"Every person entering the ancient DNA facility needs to put on protective wear to minimize the risk of contaminating samples with their own DNA. This includes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3uga","text":"- A separate set of clothes only used in the aDNA facility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffeqd","text":"- first pair of gloves ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckkk7","text":"- hair net","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r1h8","text":"- mask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b71s","text":"- Tyvek suit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lj7t","text":"- second pair of gloves (change regularly)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56lok","text":"- clogs (entry area) and boots (laboratories)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejuef","text":"- safety glasses when working with NaOCl (bleach) or other harmful chemicals (see warnings).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at7j7","text":"To avoid the introduction of amplified DNA, showering and wearing fresh clothes are mandatory after entering a modern molecular biology lab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evbg0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cv4k","text":"All workspaces need to be decontaminated with DNA Exitus or a similar product before starting and after finishing lab work. Floors need to be cleaned with diluted bleach once per week or whenever there was a risk of contamination (e.g. while drilling samples). Thorough cleaning of all equipment and furniture should be performed once per month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fc8p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f93qa","text":"All steps involving samples, extracts, or reagents need to be performed in a laminar flow hood (except during sample decontamination).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjv6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j510","text":"All equipment and consumables introduced into the aDNA facility need to be decontaminated with NaOCl (6% v/v), DNA Exitus or a similar product, irradiation with UV light, or a combination of the aforementioned. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0bf9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2va1","text":"Amplification of DNA, the processing of modern DNA (e.g. of modern reference samples), or the introduction of amplified DNA into the ancient DNA facility is forbidden.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6f0u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h1v6","text":"Negative controls (using PCR-grade water) need to be taken along with extractions and library preparations to check for systematic contaminations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h2p2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7upd","text":"Molecular biology laboratory (\"modern lab\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":43}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q8v","text":"Amplification of libraries during the indexing PCR and all further steps must be performed in a physically separated molecular biology lab. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l866","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nkn2","text":"The regular rules for protective wear in molecular biology labs apply; gloves need to be changed whenever getting in contact with libraries or reagents. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enbfo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s3dr","text":"All steps involving libraries or reagents need to be performed in a dead air hood. Surfaces and equipment need to be decontaminated with DNA Exitus or a similar product. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this collection and it's working

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7j7t","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an6po","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvnq1","text":"NaOCl (bleach) solution (6%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"500bo","text":"- H290 May be corrosive to metals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9390","text":"- H314 Causes severe skin burns and eye damage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t4jp","text":"- H411 Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cas98","text":"- EUH206 Warning! Do not use together with other products. May release dangerous gases (chlorine). Remove from surface after recommended incubation time with water-soaked tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evr6k","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dukaf","text":"DNA irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9iug","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hid8","text":"Guanidinium hydrochloride (GuHCl ) (in PB buffer of Qiagen MinElute kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vj1d","text":"- H302 Harmful if swallowed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f37ch","text":"- H332 Harmful if inhaled.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54a1p","text":"- H315 Causes skin irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqegu","text":"- H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40lp","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3irnb","text":"Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cukf","text":"- H225 Highly flammable liquid and vapor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5au5m","text":"- H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vqrc","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e7pnb","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64unh","text":"UV radiation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au4dm","text":"- UV radiation can damage eyes and can be carcinogenic in contact with skin. Do not look directly at unshielded UV radiation. Do not expose unprotected skin to UV radiation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8atkc","text":"- UV emitters generate ozone during operation. Use only in ventilated rooms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftkoe","text":"
